definition: same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved

definition: abbr. for 立法委員會|立法委员会[li4 fa3 wei3 yuan2 hui4]/abbr. for 立法委員|立法委员[li4 fa3 wei3 yuan2]

sentences.english: KCGMH was commissioned by the Kaohsiung County Government to administer the Fengshan Hospital of Kaohsiung County.
sentences.chinese: 本院接受高雄县政府委讬经营高雄县立凤山医院。

sentences.english: I have also asked some people to help me with opening and closing the church and the gates for parking.
sentences.chinese: 我已经委讬了一些教友帮忙打点圣堂和泊车闸门开关。

sentences.english: From grade one, I have been serving as the monitor and school group's committee all the time.
sentences.chinese: 从一年级起，我一直担任着班长以及学校大队委。

sentences.english: Seek advice at the same time appoint commissarial number will be flexibility, without limitation of rigid quota of people.
sentences.chinese: 同时咨询委委员人数将是弹性的，无硬性名额限制。

sentences.english: The interior design of the exhibition halls is entrusted to Ombra Bruno.
sentences.chinese: 室内设计的展览大厅，是委讬给Ombra布鲁诺。

sentences.english: Athetis lepigone is a new insect pest in seedling stage of summer corn in China, and causes serious damage.
sentences.chinese: 二点委夜蛾是我国夏玉米苗期的新害虫，危害性极强。

sentences.english: The European Union commissioned a report on anti- Semitism in member states.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟受成员国委讬编纂一份关于反犹太主义的报告。

sentences.english: The violators whom the Federal Election Commission detects may land in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 这些违规的人被联邦选举委发现可就麻烦缠身了。

sentences.english: Between settlor and trustee, due to the establishment of the trust.
sentences.chinese: 一因信讬行为成立，委讬人与受讬人间。

sentences.english: Of interest "transition committee", said the transitional government will soon comment?
sentences.chinese: 对利“过渡委”称将于近日成立过渡政府有何评论？

sentences.english: We are not prepare to point a agent for your district.
sentences.chinese: 我方不准备在你们地区委讬贵方做我方的代理。

sentences.english: It turns out that the victim asked the couple, surnamed Chang, to buy lottery tickets.
sentences.chinese: 原来是被害人委讬张姓夫妻购买彩券。

sentences.english: Handle relevant educational affairs entrusted by authorities or groups.
sentences.chinese: 七关于接受机关或团体委讬办理有关教育事项。

sentences.english: There are adequate facilities for reliability testing in-house. If not, by whom is testing performed?
sentences.chinese: 厂内的适当的可靠度测试设备，若无，委讬何者测试。

sentences.english: The Chinese delegation will be headed by chairman of the National Reforms Development Commission (NDRC) Xu Shaoshi.
sentences.chinese: 中国代表团将由国家发展改革委主任徐绍史领衔。

sentences.english: The king therefore went in all haste to appease them, leaving Andronicus, one of his nobles, for his deputy.
sentences.chinese: 国王急速去平乱，委讬他的大官安多尼苛为代理。

definition: to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join

leading small group (LSG), a CCP body that exercises general oversight on matters relating to a specific area (LSG for foreign affairs 外事工作, LSG for comprehensively deepening reforms 全面深化改革 etc)/aka central leading group
